extracted-table.table-caption: 25-item experience-sampling questionnaire completed at the end of the resting-state fMRI scan. Answers were given on a 4-point Likert scale ranging from “Not at all” to “Completely".

caption.p: 25-item experience-sampling questionnaire completed at the end of the resting-state fMRI scan. Answers were given on a 4-point Likert scale ranging from “Not at all” to “Completely".

tr.td: were vivid as if I was there
were similar to thoughts I often have
were in the form of words
tended to evolve in a series of steps
were in the form of images
were hard for me to stop
were related to a more distant time
were about ideas rather than events or objects
dragged my attention away from the external world
were on topics that I care about
were about solutions to problems (or goals)
were related to the here and now
gave me a new insight into something I have thought about before
were about an event that has happened or could take place
at different points in time were all on the same theme

extracted-table.transformed-table:
Table 1
25-item experience-sampling questionnaire completed at the end of the resting-state fMRI scan. Answers were given on a 4-point Likert scale ranging from “Not at all” to “Completely".Table 1
DimensionQuestion (My thoughts…)
Vividwere vivid as if I was there
Normalwere similar to thoughts I often have
Futureinvolved future events
Negativewere about something negative
Detailwere detailed and specific
Wordswere in the form of words
Evolvingtended to evolve in a series of steps
Spontaneouswere spontaneous
Positivewere about something positive
Imageswere in the form of images
Peopleinvolved other people
Pastinvolved past events
Deliberatewere deliberate
Selfinvolved myself
Stopwere hard for me to stop
Distant timewere related to a more distant time
Abstractwere about ideas rather than events or objects
Decoupleddragged my attention away from the external world
Importantwere on topics that I care about
Intrusivewere intrusive
Problem Solvingwere about solutions to problems (or goals)
Here and Nowwere related to the here and now
Creativegave me a new insight into something I have thought about before
Realisticwere about an event that has happened or could take place
Same Themeat different points in time were all on the same theme
